byline.original: By BILL VLASIC and NEAL E. BOUDETTE

lead_paragraph: Production of a midsize car that once starred in a Chrysler commercial is winding down, and the plant where it was made will soon be making pickups.

headline.print_headline: A Symbol of Chrysler’s Comeback Slowly Fades Away
headline.main: The Chrysler 200, Symbol of a Comeback, Slowly Fades Away

snippet: Production of a midsize car that once starred in a Chrysler commercial is winding down, and the plant where it was made will soon be making pickups.
abstract: Wheels column; Chrysler 200 sedan, seen as symbol of carmaker's comeback, is fading in sales, with first-quarter results down 63 percent from year-ago quarter; plant in Sterling Heights, Mich, that builds car is idle, and will be converted to make Ram pickup trucks.
